ingredients.item: 4 tbsp Cooksâ€™ Ingredients Sweet Chilli Sauce
2 x essential Waitrose British Beef Rump Steaks, trimmed
Half a punnet of cress, washed

instructions.step: Stir together the sweet chilli sauce and lime juice, and set aside. Season the steaks and rub with the oil. Heat a griddle pan until smoking, then place the steaks on it and cook for 2 minutes each side until char lines appear and the steak is cooked to medium. Place on a plate to rest.
Using a vegetable peeler, pare thin ribbon strips of courgette and carrot, and arrange on a serving plate with the remaining prepared salad vegetables.
Slice the steak into strips and place on top. Sprinkle over the nuts and cress. Serve with the chilli and lime dressing.
